1.name: 1. Columbo
1.description: Los Angeles homicide detective Lieutenant Columbo uses his humble ways and ingenuous demeanor to winkle out even the most well-concealed of crimes.

2.name: 2. A Clockwork Orange
2.description: Alex DeLarge and his droogs barbarize a decaying near-future.

3.name: 3. Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
3.description: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.

4.name: 4. The Decameron
4.description: An adaptation of nine stories from Boccaccio's "Decameron".

5.name: 5. All in the Family
5.description: A working class man constantly squabbles with his family over the important issues of the day.

6.name: 6. The French Connection
6.description: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.

7.name: 7. Dirty Harry
7.description: When a man calling himself "the Scorpio Killer" menaces San Francisco, tough-as-nails Police Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to track down the crazed psychopath.

8.name: 8. Carnal Knowledge
8.description: Chronicling the lifelong sexual development of two men who meet and become friends in college.

9.name: 9. Duel of Death
9.description: A business commuter is pursued and terrorized by the malevolent driver of a massive tractor-trailer.

10.name: 10. The Last Picture Show
10.description: In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied North Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.

11.name: 11. Big Jake
11.description: In 1909, when John Fain's gang kidnaps Jacob McCandles' grandson and holds him for ransom, Big Jake sets out to rescue the boy.

12.name: 12. Straw Dogs
12.description: A young American and his English wife come to rural England and face increasingly vicious local harassment.

13.name: 13. Escape from the Planet of the Apes
13.description: The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society, but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

14.name: 14. Fiddler on the Roof
14.description: In pre-revolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant with traditional values contends with marrying off three of his daughters with modern romantic ideals while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.

15.name: 15. Diamonds Are Forever
15.description: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas where he uncovers an evil plot involving a rich business tycoon.

16.name: 16. The Devils
16.description: In 17th-century France, Father Urbain Grandier's protection of the city of Loudun from the corrupt Cardinal Richelieu is undermined by a sexually repressed nun's accusation of witchcraft.

17.name: 17. Wake in Fright
17.description: After a bad gambling bet, a schoolteacher is marooned in a town full of crazy, drunk, violent men who threaten to make him just as crazy, drunk, and violent.

18.name: 18. Vanishing Point
18.description: During the 1970s, car-delivery driver Kowalski delivers hot rods in record time, but always runs into trouble.

19.name: 19. Klute
19.description: A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.

20.name: 20. Bedknobs and Broomsticks
20.description: An apprentice witch, three kids, and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.

21.name: 21. Upstairs, Downstairs
21.description: The lives and fortunes of the Bellamy family and their below-stairs servant staff at 165 Eaton Place play out against the social, political and historical backdrop of Edwardian London from 1903 to 1930.

22.name: 22. Harold and Maude
22.description: Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.

23.name: 23. Walkabout
23.description: Two city-bred siblings are stranded in the Australian Outback, where they learn to survive with the aid of an Aboriginal boy on his "walkabout": a ritual separation from his tribe.

24.name: 24. Get Carter
24.description: When his brother dies under mysterious circumstances in a car accident, London gangster Jack Carter travels to Newcastle to investigate.

25.name: 25. The Andromeda Strain
25.description: Top scientists work feverishly in a secret, state-of-the-art laboratory to discover what killed the citizens of a small town and how the deadly contagion can be stopped.
